entries.Introduction: %Before you stands what could be the most muscular woman - no, human on the planet. #$b#%It's difficult for your mind to take in just how obscenely muscular this girl is.#$b#%One look at her monsterous figure immediately gives off an aura of dominance and power.#$b#%Mountain-like traps flank her beautiful face, reaching her ears and pushing aside her long golden hair.#$b#%Her pecs are so enormous, that she could easily rest her chin on them, were she so inclined.#$b#With each breath she takes, her meaty chest rises, closing the gap under her chin even further.#$b#%Her shoulders are so wide, that unless you were to step back, you wouldn't be able to see all of her.#$b#%Her skin looks taunt over the swells of her muscles - there doesn't seem to be an ounce of bodyfat anywhere.#$b#%She is in a word; gargantuan.#$b#% You realize that she could easily swat you like a fly, and you instinctively step out of her path.#$b#%This beast of a woman looks past her engorged pecs at you, and scoffs.#$b#Out of the way, short-stuff.$0#$b# You're lucky I noticed you there, otherwise I might have accidentally crushed you just now.$6#$b#Oh yeah, you must be that new farmer. You don't look like much though...$3#$b#Listen I'm too busy being a goddess to make friends with someone who plays with dirt all day.$0#$b#So why don't you scurry off and go find a rock to cower under?$1
entries.danceRejection: Ugh, get real.$3#$b#You're so small that I would probably crush you by mistake.$3
entries.divorced: Don't come near me.$2#$b#I knew I was too much woman for you to handle.$11
entries.breakUp: You've got a lot of nerve, breaking up with a goddess.$11#$b#Why don't you walk away now before I decide to get vengeful?!$5
entries.dumped_Girls: Have you ever wondered what it'd be like to have you head crushed by the world's biggest thighs?$3
entries.secondChance_Girls: I figured you'd come crawling back.$1#$b# Let's face it, you'll never meet another woman like me.$6
entries.Mon: This town is so small. It sucks.$2#$b#I'd have to drive, like, twenty miles to reach a decent gym.$2#$e#Not that I'd fit in a car...$3#$b#You're handy, right?#$b#Why dont' you just, build me a gym?$1
entries.Mon2: You'd never get this but...$0#$b#Having this much muscle feels so good...$6#$b#I'm never going back to being tiny like you.$1
entries.Mon4: God, my lats feel so thick today...#$b#It wouldn't be a problem, but I can't reach back there to scratch this itch...$3#$b#@!$11#$b#Be a good little boy...^Be a good little girl...#$b#And scratch my back for me.$10#$e#You'll do a good job too, if you know what's good for you. *giggle*.$1#$b#%Haley wasn't kidding about her swollen back muscles.#$b#%It must be difficult to rest her arms at her sides, let alone scratch her own back...#$b#%Gingerly you reach up to complete your task.#$b#%Before you even make contact with her pale skin, you feel a powerful warmth on your fingertips.#$b#%You decide to get to work before Haley gets angry.#$b#Ahh.... *giggle*$8#$b#That's much better.$1#$b#You did a decent enough job, @.#$b#I should carry you around in my bag for when I need back scratches!$1
entries.Mon6: @!$11#$b# It's about time you showed up, I've been waiting to see you.$3#$b#You know I hate being made to wait.$3#$b#Anyway, now that you're finally here...$0#$b#I hit a new max on my bench press this morning.$10#$e#Since you're such a fan of my muscles.#$b#And I'm so generous...#$b#I thought you might like to see me while I'm all pumped up...#$b#Feast your eyes...!$6#$b#%Haley fixes her posture before leaning forward and bringing her massive arms in for a crab flex.#$b#%Immediately the sinews that make up her engourged pecs spring to life.#$b#%As she continues to slowly put more effort into her flex, each tiny striation becomes visable under her paper thin skin.#$b#% As she reaches the apex of her flex, thick veins begin to form, adding even more definition to her mind bending chest.#$b#%The sight is almost enough to make you almost gag, but somehow you know that you want to see more.#$b#*grunt*$6#$b#How's that? Enough muscle for you?$6#$b#I hope not, because I'm going to get even bigger!$6#$b#Oh and that little show wasn't free by the way.#$b#I expect a present tomorrow to cover it!$1
entries.Mon8: %Haley hasn't noticed you yet.#$b#%She draws back her shoulder blades, causing her incredible traps to bunch up.#$b#% The forming canyon of muscle continues to deepen down her back.#$b#%As if the sight wasn't impressive enough already, she starts to circle her shoulders.#$b#%Every swollen knot of muscle that makes up her titanic back dances and plays with the motion.#$b#% You find yourself becoming hypnotized by the rythm.#$b#%The intoxicating display comes to an end much to your dismay.#$b#%Haley turns to face you, with a knowing smirk on her face.#$b#You know, one of these days I'm going to have to start charging you my cam fee for all of these free shows...$10#$b# Not that I mind you watching.$8#$b#I built this massive body, and I love it when people worship it...$8#$b#Maybe if you beg... I'll let you watch for free a little while longer...$8
entries.Tue: God. Have you ever considered going to the gym once or twice?$3#$b#You're absolutely pathetic looking.$11#$b#How do you even manage running a farm when you're so scrawny?$3
entries.Tue2: You know, I could use a towel boy.^girl.#$b#You should just quit being a farmer and follow me around, @.$1#$b#Hmm...? Pay?$13#$b# *laugh* Yeah right! That's cute...$1#b#Your payment would be getting to watch me transform into the most powerful person on the planet.$6
entries.Tue4: The straps on my top are getting tight again.$3#$b#If I keep growing like this, Emily is going to have to make me another new outfit.$3#$b#.Which would be fine, but then I have to listen to her lecture me!$5#$b#She should be more like you, and worship me and do whatever I say.$10
entries.Tue6: I ran into Abigail recently...#$b#She actually thinks she's gaining on me. *laugh*$1#$b#She is getting pretty jacked though...$2#$b#I really like being the biggest around, why does she have to try and take that from me?$2.
entries.Tue8: %You catch Haley going through instagram snapshots of herself on her phone.#$b#%Pictures from before she became a bodybuilder, pictures of herself still growing.#$b#%It's bizzare to think that she used to have a 'normal' body at one point.#$b#%With every snapshot she brings up, she attempts to copy the pose in the picture.#$b#%She grunts as she puts effort into each colossal flex.#$b#%The sheer contrast between her current and past bodies is astounding.#$b#%You wonder if she'll ever stop growing.
entries.Wed: Ugh, like today wasn't boring enough already...$3#$b#Can't you go be a dusty farmer somewhere else?$11#$b#To bring out each and every muscle, I have to take really good care of my skin.$6#$b#Which is why I don't need you getting me all dirty!$11#$b#Not that you'd understand.$7
entries.Wed2: The only thing I like about this town is the beach.$3#$b#If we had a tanning salon that would be way better though...$2#$b#I don't want to maintain a tan year round...$3#$b#But I look damn good with a deep tan. It makes every single muscle pop!$6
entries.Wed4: Look, I know I can be a bit of a diva sometimes...$7#$b#But that's just what you get when you spend time with a goddess.$10#$b#You've been catching on quick.$0#$b#So I don't mind you coming to see me.$1
entries.Wed6: Ugh... One of my commenters told me I look like a bull.$2#$b#@!Tell me how good I look!$11#$b#%After you swallow your initial nervousness, you begin to honestly describe what makes Haley so alluring.#$b#%Her dedication to her lifestyle, her assertiveness, her sheer willpower, and her gorgeous looks.#$b#%You keep to yourself that she's also a living example of your deepest of fetishes.#$b#%Haley's expression softens, relieved by your ernest response.#$b#*giggle* Thanks, @. I actually feel better.$8#$b#Uh, I mean...!$13#$b#You're damn right!$10#$b#Of course I'm amazing! There isn't a woman alive as jacked as me!$6#$b#More importantly, I'm going to keep getting bigger!$1
entries.Wed8: Well if it isn't my number one fan!$10#$b#Thought you might like to see me before this pump wears off.$10#$b#I just feel so stuffed, like my muscles could burst out of my skin at any moment!$6#$b#It feels amazing. If I could, I'd stay pumped like this 24/7!$6#$b#Just you wait, cause I'm going to keep getting bigger.$10#$b#I'll look back at my current body and wonder how I put up with being so small.
entries.Thu: #$1 HaleyClothes#So few things fit me any more.#$b#It's the price I have to pay for being the biggest, strongest woman on the planet.#$b#I'd say it's a fair trade-off.
entries.Thu2: Unless the next thing you're about to do is offer a protein shake to your goddess...$11#$b#I'd get out of her way.$3
entries.Thu4: I've been thinking of doing worshipping sessions, to make some extra cash.$3#$b#Oh? What's with that look?$13#$b#Maybe you'd like that kind of thing?$4#$b#Hope you've got the gold for it, I don't come cheap...$6
entries.Thu6: %Haley is performing a mind bending lat spread.#$b#%The way her meaty, wing-like lats swell and prevent her arms from resting at her sides boggles the mind.#$b#%With a little effort she manages to spread her lats even further.#$b#%It's truly a sight to behold.#$b#%Pleased with her spread, Haley brings her arms back in, and crunches down into a most muscular pose.#$b#%Her traps swell forward, engulfing her bull-like neck, and pushing her golden locks back.#$b#%Thick veins adorn her steely muscles.#$b#Mmm.... God I love flexing...*giggle*$6#$b#I could do this all day...$6
entries.Thu8: Oh, @!$1#$b#I figured you'd come by at some point to worship at the temple of Haley.$10#$b#Your timing couldn't be better!$1#$b#I have this aweful knot under my shoulderblade, but I can't reach it alone.$12#$b#So be a good servant, and give me a massage!$10#$b#*giggle* Some people would pay a fortune to rub down a goddess like me, so consider yourself lucky!$1#$b#%The thought of getting to touch Haley's incredible body is enough get your mind racing.#$b#%You compose yourself however and focus on the task at hand.#$b#%Haley loosens her muscles as much as possible to give your fingers a chance of denting her iron-like back.#$b#%You begin to apply pressure to the space you would assume her shoulder blades would lay.#$b#%It's impossible to tell for certain, as they are hidden behind several layers of dense muscle.#$b#Mmm... That actually feels pretty good, @.$8#$b#Your hands are much stronger than I gave you credit for...$8#$b#%You continue to kneed at the spot.#$b#%Haley's soft moans let you know when you've found the right place.#$b#%After kneeding for several minutes, Haley brings her shoulders backward and flexes her titanic back.#$b#Ahh... That's much better, thanks @.$4#$b#I'm going to keep you in mind next time I get a knot that needs kneeding...$8
entries.Fri: %Haley is ignoring you, which is no small wonder.#$b#To her, you must seem as small as an insect.#$b#%That thought reminds you that she could easily swat you, and you reflexively back away.
entries.Fri2: I told you before I don't want to get all dirty didn't I?$11#$b#If you're going to be covered in soil all the time...$3#$b#Why don't you go hang out with linus the bag person?$3
entries.Fri4: *huff* *huff*$5#$b#...$5#$b#Hmph!$3#$b#.Don't come near me.#$b#My injections make me really moody some times.$2#$b#I can't garuntee I won't take it out on you.$11#$b#It's all going to be worth it though...$7#$b#I'll do whatever it takes to be the biggest...$3
entries.Fri6: @!$13#$b#I just finished what might have been my best workout yet.$2#$b#But I still feel awful...$2#$b#It's gotta be this new stuff I'm taking...$3#$b#...$7#$b#...Tell me I'm a goddess.$11#$b#%Haley seems like she's hurting.#$b#%Beyond you just not wanting her to be mad at you, you also want to cheer her up.#$b#%You remind her that she is your goddess, and that you will always worship her.#$b#%Haley slowly closes the distance between the two of you, scanning your expression for sincerity.#$b#%You feel her massive shadow completely eclipse you.#$b#...$11#$b#Good, you can go.$7#$b#...And thanks.$4
entries.Fri8: %Haley is sobbing to herself.#$b#%Before you question why that might be, you remember that the various steroids she takes cause her mood to swing on occasion.#$b#%Mustering every ounce of courage you possess, you approach Haley and ask if she's alright.#$b#Oh... *sniff* Yeah I'm okay...$2#$b#It's just another stupid mood swing.$2#$b#I'm getting used to them.$2#$b#...$2#$b#It's... all worth it right?$2#$b#%You've never seen Haley this vulnerable.#$b#%Even knowing full well that if she didn't like your response, she could break you in half...#$b#%Your concern outweighs your fear.#$b#%You tell her that she is the most amazing woman that you've ever met, and remind her that she is your goddess.#$b#...$17#$b#...Thanks, @.$4#$b#*giggle* I actually feel a lot better now.$1#$b#Some day I'm going to repay your kindness...$8
entries.Sat: I'm feeling an urge to go shopping.#$b#Ugh! I wish there was a mall here.$3#$b#Not that they would carry goddess sized clothing anyway...$3#$b#Whatever, I guess that's what emily is good for.$0
entries.Sat2: You'd look cute with a little collar.#$b#You already follow me around like a dog.$0#$b#I bet I could even fit you in my bag!$1
entries.Sat4: %Haley is looking very confident today.#$b#%She seems to have a little extra strut in her gait.#$b#%Not caring if anyone is watching, she pulls her enormous arms up into a double biceps flex.#$b#%The incredible peaks of her biceps swell, eventually brushing the against her clenched finger tips.#$b#%She coos, enjoying the sensation of her glorious flex.#$b#%Haley then puts a little extra effort into her flex.#$b#%You stare in awe as her bicep head begins to push her hand back upward.#$b#%Seemingly satisfied, Haley drops her flex and continues her walk, with a pleased smirk on her face.
entries.Sat6: Oh shoot! I forgot to update my instagram today.$13#$b#@, stand right there, don't worry I'll blur out your face.$10#$b#%Haley takes out her smart phone and stands next to you.#$b#%You do as you're told and don't move.#$b#%As she presses closer to you, you begin to feel the heat radiating from her massive body.#$b#Flex your right arm!$0#$b#%You bring your arm up and perform wht would be a flex, if you had any muscles.#$b#%Haley matches your pose with her monsterous arm.#$b#$%You could easily fit several of your own arm in just one of hers.#$b#%Haley snaps the selfie then quickly steps away from you.#$b#%You feel downright exhausted just from the tension of that brief moment.#$b#Great! I'm going to call it 'Look how small he is compared to a goddess!'^she is compared to a goddess!'$1#$b#Thanks, @!
entries.Sat8: That picture we took together got so many hits!$1#$b#$We should totally do some more!$1#$b#I mean it's not like you don't get anything out of it.$8#$b#You've made it pretty clear that you really do worship me.$8#$b#Just think of it as a chance to spend even more time with your goddess.$8#$b#And if you're good, maybe I'll give you a reward...$8
entries.Sun: I hear Abigail gets her steroids from Maru.$3#$b#I tried what she had to offer, but it was too weak.$11#$b#I get the real stuff from the internet.$11
entries.Sun2: Out of the way small fry.#$b#I just got done my injections and I feel like I could bench press a pickup truck!$10#$b#If you get in my way, I might just use you as an weight instead.$10
entries.Sun4: I might need to double up on my supplements again soon...$3#$b#My body is getting so big that I'll need all the nutrients I can get to keep growing.$3
entries.Sun6: @, come here for a sec.#$b#I usually have Emily do my injections for me, but she's meditating or whatever...$3#$b#So you get the privilage of doing it today!$1#$b#Savor this moment, where you get to help your goddess get even bigger!#$b#%Haley hands you a vial containing a cocktail of potent steroids.#$b#%If you were to be injected with this, it would likely kill you on the spot.#$b#%For Haley however this is a part of her daily routine.#$b#%Haley bends over, and pulls down one side of her shorts.#$b#%Her exposed glute looks hard and striated, even unflexed.#$b#%You wonder if the needle will even penetrate her steely flesh.#$b#Don't keep me waiting, @.#$b#Do it all in one go.#$b#%You do as you're told, and inject the needle into Haley's bulging glute.#$b#%As you depress the plunger, you watch the liquid housed in the vial slowly disappear.#$b#%You're not sure why, but you feel a sense of excitement watching Haley absorb the drug.#$b#%The knowlage that she'll get even bigger from this thrills you.#$b#Thanks, @.#$b#Though I'm sure getting to see my ass was thanks enough!$1#$b#I might need you to do this again in the future.$4
entries.Sun8: %Haley approaches you with a stern look on her face.#$b#%You wonder what the issue could be.#$e#%That is, until you notice that she is clutching two vials of steroids and a needle in her hands.#$b#@!$11#$b#Emily refused to let me double up on my injections today!#$b#Where does she get off telling me what to do?!$5#$b#I'm more woman then she'll ever be!!$5#$b#Like yeah, it's risky or whatever, but I need this.$3#$b#I can't let anyone catch up to me.$3#$b#%You wonder who could even pose a threat to Haley in terms of sheer size.#$b#%Even most male bodybuilders struggle to attain the level of muscle she posseses, let alone her conditioning.#$b#%Just then you notice tears forming in the corners of Haley's eyes.#$b#I just... I need to be the biggest, you know?$2#$b#%Clearly she's experiecing a steroid induced mood swing again.#$b#%You console Haley, reminding her that she is likely the most muscular human on the planet already.#$b#%You promise her that no matter what, she will always be your goddess, steroids or no.#$b#...$2#$b#*giggle*$4#$b#Right... Sorry you had to see me like this.$4#$b#I won't double up on my injections... it isn't safe.$17#$b#I'm not ready to go without them yet though...$2#$b#I'm going home, thanks, @.$4

entries.Event_room1: Him? No!#$b#...Well, I guess I used to like Alex. But not anymore! He's immature.
entries.Event_room2: What? That sounds fun, but I wouldn't want to leave Stardew Valley right now...
entries.spring_Mon: Listen, when you get as jacked as I am, you don't have to deal with lesser people.$3#$b#That means you.$11
entries.spring_Mon2: What a beautiful day!$1#$b#It's perfect for squats!
entries.spring_Mon4: What a beautiful day!$1#$b#It's perfect for squats!$10#$b#Since you're here, @ you can go get me a protein shake!$1
entries.spring_Mon6: My instagram followers almost tripled when I unveiled my muscles for the first time.#$b#They're what keep me going.#$b#Not that there are too many downsides to being a ripped goddess.$10
entries.spring_Mon8: @! Perfect timing!$1#$b#I knew you'd be coming by at some point.#$b#Well I mean you're like a little puppy following me around and slobbering.$0#$b#Not that I mind, I guess.$4#$b#Anyway! I wanted you to check out these veins!!$6#$b#Just wrapped up an amazing chest day. Pretty impressive, right?$6
entries.spring_Tue: Ugh, I bent another weight bar...$2#$e#I must have loaded too much weight on it again...$2
entries.spring_Tue2: Oops forgot to upload my daily instagram post.#$b#I should do it now before people wonder what's up.
entries.spring_Tue4: Do you use instagram, @?#$b#I have a couple thousand followers now, so I'm kinda big there.#$b#Well, actually, I'm big everywhere always.$6
entries.spring_Tue6: %Haley is doing pushups.#$b#%Her form is perfect, and her motions are steady and deliberate.#$b#You watch in awe as her moutainous back flexes and spreads with each rep.#$b#%She's clearly been doing this for a while, as sweat has begun to pool in the grooves between her swollen muscles.#$b#%Instinctively you reach for a towel for your goddess, only to realize she hadn't asked for one yet, nor did you have one in the first place.#$b#%You contemplate just how much she has conditioned you to serve her.
entries.spring_Tue8: You know I've really been wanting my own place, but everything around here is taken.$2#$b#Maybe I'll just take your farm!$1#$b#It's not like you could stop me, even if you wanted to...$6#$b#...$6#$b#Pfft, just kidding!$1#$b#I wouldn't actually do that to you.$0#$b#The look on your face says you were thinking about it though.$4#$b#I guess I wouldn't mind living on a farm at some point.$8
entries.spring_Wen: I'm a GODDESS! Emily can just take care of the trash herself!!!$5#$b#What do you think you're looking at?!$a
entries.spring_Wen8: Now that I'm this jacked, I've been thinking about what It'd be like to do manual labor for a living.#$b#I mean you do it every day, right?#$b#And you're scrawny and stuff.$3#$b#No offense.#$b#I mean working out several hours a day can't been all that different right?#$b#Maybe I'll work on a farm one day.$4#$b#I guess you inspired me.$4
entries.spring_Thu: I need new lifting gloves with better support.#$b#My weights are so heavy now that it hurts my wrists...$2
entries.spring_Thu4: I think I'm going to give my pecs some extra loving today.$10#$b#I love how they feel after a good pump.$6
entries.spring_Thu8: @, I need you.$11#$b#%With a gulp, and not a second thought, you give Haley your undivided attention.#$b#Good boy^Good girl!$1#$b#Look carefully. One of my fans said my right bicep is bigger than my left.$11#$b#Are they right?$2#$b#%Haley lifts her massive arms and curls them into a classic double biceps flex.#$b#%As the mounds of steely flesh harden and lock, thick veins form under her skin, adding extra detail.#$b#%While you'd like nothing more than to stop and marvel at these amazing biceps for a bit longer... You've been given a task.#$b#%you examine both biceps carefully and find that they're perfectly symmetrical, save for the network of veins that crawl along them.#$b#...So they are the same size?$2#$b#Ugh, I thought so, but I needed to be sure. I was worried for nothing.$3#$b#Thanks, @.$1
entries.spring_Fri: Oh, it's the farmer again.#$b#Can't you see I'm busy?$3#$e#Ugh...$3
entries.summer4: Are you growing any melons on your farm this year?#$b#I've always wanted to compare my biceps to one!$1#$b#One day, I'll have biceps bigger than anything you can grow on your farm.$6
entries.summer_Mon: Tanning is totally a pain when you're this big.#$b#Making sure you get all the nooks and crannies is important.#$b#It's such a hassle, but the results are worth it.#$b#Gonna need a new bikini though.$3#$b#I doubt the straps from my old one will fit around my lats anymore.$3
entries.summer_Mon2: I wonder how much longer it's going to take to get a sponsorship...#$b#I mean look at me! I'm the biggest woman on the planet!$6#$b#You'd think sponsors would be lining up to have me...$2
entries.summer_Mon4: I'm going to need bigger weights again.$2#$b#I barely have room for the ones I have now.$3#$b#Sometimes I wish I had my own place like you do, @$2.
entries.summer_Mon6: I love how huge and thick my pecs are now.$1#$b$#They're easily my fave muscles$6#$b#I just love how it feels to squeeeeeze them...$6#$b#I can tell you liek them too, @ *giggle*.$1
entries.summer_Mon8: I don't give you enough credit some times, @.#$b#I mean yeah, you're puny or whatever.$3#$b#But you work your farm all day, then still make time to come by and worship your goddess.$4#$b#Don't think I don't apreciate it.$4
entries.summer_Tue: God it's hot out.$2#$b#Some tiems I'm tempted to just go topless.#$b#It'd be so much cooler, and let's be real...$3#$b#No one could stop me even if they wanted to.$10
entries.summer_Tue2: Ugh, Caroline told me I shouldn't wear such skimpy clothes.$3#$b#Have you seen me?$3#$b#Normal clothes don't even fit.#2#$b#Not that I want to hide this awesome body anyway.$10
entries.summer_Tue4: You know a thing or two about smithing right?#$b#I need someone to make me some new barbell plates.#$b#I just keep out lifting all the ones I have!$11
entries.summer_Tue6: %Haley is taking selfies of herself flexing her gargantuan muscles.#$b#%No doubt to post on her instagram, which is already filled with various shots of her amazing flexes.#$b#%She pulls the camera upward and points it down toward the valley between her mammoth pecs.#$b#%She draws her shoulders in and squeezes to maximize the size and vasularity of her chest.#$b#%Thick veins begin to web across her pecs as she applies more and more effort into her flex.#$b#%You imagine getting to feel that mountainous chest, and get excited.#$b#Ugh... yeah...$6#$b#I know you're staring, @.$6#$b#You should follow my 'gram, there's lots more flexing where this came from on there...10
entries.summer_Tue8: God I'm so big...$8#$b#I love it. All the working out, all the steroids...$0#$b#It's all worth it for this.$6#$b#...God, I don't know what's in my injections lately...$8#$b# but they've started making me really hornyandter I take them...$8#$b#And when I get a look at what I've become.$8#$b#How massive I am.$6#$b#It gets me so worked up, I can barely finish my workout.$8#$b#...Tell me I'm your goddess.$6
entries.summer_Wed: The summer heat feels good on my skin.#$b#It's one of the up sides of being able to dress so light.
God, I'm so over living in this valley.$3#$b#I want a gym!!$2
entries.summer_Wed2: Unless you're here to bring me an ice cold sports drink...$3#$b#You can go somewhere else.
entries.summer_Wed4: I asked Emily if she's make me a new top today, but she said she's already working on one for Abigail.#$b#Shouldn't sisters take priority?#$b#I'm just being moody I guess.#$b#So what's up, @?.
entries.summer_Wed6: %Haley looks like she just did a killer workout.#$b#%She's sporting an impressive pump, and is covered with thick, throbbing veins.#$b#%She stops and brings one of her mammoth biceps up for a flex.#$b#%Even Haley looks surprised by just hwo azingly huge her swollen limb has become.#$b#%She coos at the sight, marvelling in her own hugeness.#$b#%You wonder just how much more muscle she could possibly manage to pack on to her frame.
entries.summer_Wen8: @, I need to tell you about this incredible dream I had last night.$10#$b#Don't let it get to your head, but you were in it.$3#$b#So like, in the dream...#$b#You and I were kinda together.$4#$b#Anyway, I was at the benchpress, banging out reps...#$b#But like, nothing fazed me.#$b#So you kept bringing me more weights.#$b#you kept loading up more and more weights, and I just kept lifting and lifting.#$b#I guess we ran out of weights at some point, so I sat up from the pench...#$b#That when I realized how huge I had gotten!$13#$b#It was incredible! I must have doubled my muscle mass! No maybe eve tripled it!$13#$b#God it felt so good. I felt like a living mountain.#$b#I could barely see past my pecs!$13#$b#I guess I woke up after that, cause that's all I remember.$2
entries.summer_Thu: This isn't my natural hair color.#$b#One of my followers commented that I'd look hotter as a blonde.#$b#They were totally right though don't you think?$1
entries.summer_Thu4: I'm so lucky this year, I've had like zero mosquito bites!$1#$b#Maybe they can't even pierce my skin.$6#$b#%You muse to yourself that the mosquitos likely died of a steroid overdose before they could get any blood.#$b#%But you decide to keep that quip to yourself for your own safety.
entries.summer_Thu6: @, I need you to do something for me.#$b#%Haley hands you a bottle of sunscreen.#$b#%Your mind begins to race.#$b#Emily had already left this morning, so I could only do my front.#$b#Which is lucky for you, since now it's your job!#$b#%Haley pulls the straps of her top to the side to give you better access.#$b#%She uses her girthy forearm to cover her exposed chest.#$b#Do a good enough job, and I might even let you do it again...$18#$b#%You feel all the blood in your body rushing to your head.#$b#%Dispite this, you gather all of your composure, and get to work applying the sunscreen.#$b#%Even though the lotion is cold, your hands immediately warm up against Haley's skin.#$b#%You carfully massage the lotion into each of the stoney lumps and swells that make up Haley's wide back.#$b#%As if teasing you, she spreads her cobra-like lats.#$b#%She seems to almost double in width.#$b#%Even still, you finish your task.#$b#Took you long enough.#$b#Guess you were enjoying yourself.$10
entries.summer_Thu8: There isn't a single moment where I regret getting into bodybuilding.#$b#I love just about everything about it.#$b#The power, the recognition.$0#$b#I've earned it, and I love that.$6#$b#I also love the look on your face, as my shadow completely eclipses your tiny body...$6
entries.summer_Fri4: I skipped my cam session last night and did some posing practice.#$b#Not going to lie, even I get excited staring at this amazing body...$8
entries.summer_Fri8: This heat is nice and all, but it's exhausing working out in this heat.$3#$b#But it's the only way to keep getting bigger.#$b#I'm sure as hell not going to let the weather stop me.#$b#...But you know, having a loyal worshipper to fan me during my workouts would be nice...$8
entries.summer_Sat: Ugh I ran out of L-carnatine powder...$2#$b#It takes forever to get more out here in the boonies too.$3#$b#Guess I could ask Maru if she knows how to make it...$2#$b#I need it to keep the fat off and my muscles looking cut.$1
entries.summer_Sat4: God if I could, I would so eat a ton of ice cream today.#$b#But if I just ate whatever I wanted I'd look fat like Abigail.$3#$b#In the end looking lean and vascular is better than all the ice cream in the world.$10
entries.summer_Sat6: Ugh, @. You're late.$3#$b#I'll forgive you right now if you get on your knees and tell me I'm your goddess...$6#$b#%You quickly do as your told.#$b#%You dramatically swear your undying fealty to her, your goddess, making sure to also compliment her strength and beauty.#$b#No one asked you to get all shakespeare...$3#$b#...But it was actually kinda cute. I forgive you.$4
entries.summer_Sat8: %Haley hasn't noticed you.#$b#%She has ear buds in and seems to be enjoying some post-workout music.#$b#%You notice that she's flexing her pumped up pecs to the beat of her song.#$b#%You watch in rapt fascination as she bounces each massive pec seperately.#$b#%There truely isn't an ounce of fat on her amazing chest.#$b#%Which makes it all the easier to see those steely sinews dance and skip beneath her paper thin skin.#$b#%It's an incredible sight, one that you might never forget.#$b#%You can't hear it, but based on Haley's body language, you assume the song ended, and a slower, more sensual song has begun.#$b#%Slowly and methodically, Haley begins to roll her huge pecs.#$b#%You watch in awe as the deep rippling waves slowly travel up her chest.#$b#%The amount of control she has over her muscle stuffed pecs leaves you slack-jawed.#$b#%Somehow though, you snap out of it, and regain some composure.#$b#%You decide to commit this spectacle to memory and move on before you get caught staring.
entries.summer_Sun: Emily convinced me to try a veggie breakfast and now I feel sluggish...$2#$b#She knows that if I don't get enough protein and carbs in my meals I can't workout to the fullest.$3
entries.summer_Sun4: I accidentally cracked the floorboard in my room when I dropped a weight on it.$2#$b#Do you think Robin can fix it?$2
entries.summer_Sun6: Do you have any idea just how many calories I have to eat in a day to keep putting on muscle?$3#$b#It's a lot.$2#$b#So you'd better keep bringing me gifts of food.#$b#Your goddess needs every last calorie...$6
entries.summer_Sun8: @, I'm glad you're here.#$b#Help me mesaure my arm real quick. It's been a while since I checked.$1#$b#%Haley hands you a mesauring tape, then flexes her massive bicep in from of your face.#$b#Hang on, I can get it bigger...*grunt*$12#$b#%Haley repeatedly flexes, each time pumping more and more heith and girth into her outrageous bicep, which was now lined with thick veins.#$b#*phew* All pumped up. Ok mesure now.$6#$b#%You attempt to wrap the tape around her engorged limb, but it is simply too small. It doesn't wrap all the way around.#$b#%You can only imagine her arms must be a minimum of 30 inches, possibly more.#$b#%Haley looks like she can't decide if she's happy that she outflexed the tape, or annoyed that she didn't get a conclusive answer.#$b#Hmph, whatever. I'll try to find another tape.$3
entries.fall_Mon: Unless you have a mint chocolate whey protein shake for me, you can keep walking.$3
entries.fall_Mon4: Emily says that the spirits are really dormant this time of year.#$b#Like, what does that even mean?$3
entries.fall_Mon8: %Haley is effortlessly performing some bodyweight squats, likely warming up for leg day.#$b#%For some people this would be a challenging workout unto itself, but for Haley it's practically challengeless.#$b#%Even still, she begins to develope a slight pump in her tree trunk quads, and veins begin to sprout along them.#$b#%You marvel at her legs as they get slightly larger with every dip.
entries.fall_Tue: %Haley is red with anger.#$b#%She hasn't seen you yet, and for your own safety, you decide to keep it that way.#$e#...$5
entries.fall_Tue2: I always feel so gross after working out in the fall...$2#$b#Maybe it's becuase the air is so damp and cold?$2
entries.fall_Tue4: @, good timing, I need you for a sec.#$b#%Haley hands you her digital camera and instructs you to take a few shots of her flexing.#$b#%As she performs various flexes in her routine, you can't help but feel like she's posing just for you.#$b#%But you rationalize that it must just be because of the fact that you're making eye contact becuase of the camera.#$b#Done. you did an ok job.#$b#These are going right up on my instagram!$1
entries.fall_Tue8: @! Thank god you're here, I need someone I can actually rely on.$1#$b%So you've got pretty strong hands from working on your farm right?$0#$b#What I need from you is to give my traps a good rub down.$6#$b#I worked my shouders today. Maybe a little too much. And Now they ache.$2#$e#%Haley turns around and shrugs her massive shoulders.#$b#%Her immense traps rise upward, smothering even more of her thick neck.#$b#%With a gulp you place your hands on her swollen traps. They're rock solid, and yet soft and warm to the touch.#$b#%You begin to kneed, but her traps are too hard. You ask if she could please relax her muscles.#$b#%Once she relaxes, you solider on, putting as much pressure on the muscles as your hands will allow.#$b#%It's only now that you notice just how small your hands seem next to these massive mounds of flesh.#$b#%Haley seems to be enjoying your massage. Every now and then you can hear her stifle moans of pleasure.#$b#Mmm, that felt great *giggle*.$8#$b#I might have to keep you around to rub me down after every workout.$8
entries.fall_Wed2: I don't have time for whatever it is you're here for.$3#$b#I have a cam show later, and I need to get pumped.$0
entries.fall_Wed6: Hey @, you're working on the comunity center right?#$b#What if we just converted it into a nice gym?$1#$b#That's way better than whatever it used to be, right?$1
entries.fall_Wed8: %You notice that Haley's skin is slightly red and... steamy?#$b#Ahh... $8#$b#I did a massive full upperbody workout today, so I rewarded myself with a trip to the indoor spa.$8#$b#The water was so nice, and warm.$8#$b#%The mental image of Haley's naked body bathing rushes into your mind.#$b#%Warm water washing over all of her lumps and curves fills you with excitement.#$b#...The look on your face is seriously gross, @.$3
entries.fall_Thu: Why can't gus serve smoothies? Or protein shakes?$2
entries.fall_Sun: Today is sunday so that means I have a show to do tonight.$#$b#But I don't want to. I'm not feeling it today.$2
entries.winter_Mon: Listen, I'm sure being a farmer is boring in the winter, or whatever.$3#$b#But don't think that means you can just waste my time.#$b#So excuse me, but I have gains to make.$3
entries.winter_Mon6: You know I wouldn't mind helping you put some on some muscle, you know.#$b#You hang around me all the time anyway, and winter is slow for you right?
entries.winter_Tue2: The cold makes it hard to work out outdoors...$2
entries.winter_Thu2: I wanna be even beigger in time for next summer.#$b#I can't let the cold slow me down.$3
entries.winter_Wed6: %Dispite the cold, Haley is a lightly dressed as ever.#$b#The low temperature doesn't seem to have slowed down her gains either.#$b#Haley is sporting a serious pump, complete with bulging veins.#$b#@, nice timing.#$b#I just finished up a set, bring me a shake.$11
entries.winter_Thu6: Maybe I'll donate some of my skirts to a charity this spring.#$e#It's not like they fit me anymore anyway.$3

Entries.11/f Haley 500/p Haley/p Emily: 50s/6 20/farmer -10 -10 0 Haley 5 20 1 Emily 8 20 3/skippable/pause 1000/shake Haley 500/pause 500/speak Haley "Urgghh! You can't just leave your stupid yoga mats here!$5#$b#It's MY week to have the living room!!$5"/emote Emily 12/speak Emily "You're being childish, Haley. You agreed to let me use it this week because I did your share of the dishes...$u"/pause 200/warp farmer 2 24/playSound doorClose/pause 400/faceDirection Haley 2/faceDirection Emily 2/speak Haley "Oh, it's that tiny farm boy.$7^Oh, it's that tiny girl from the farm.$7"/faceDirection Emily 3/speak Emily "He has a name, you know.$u^She has a name, you know.$u"/move farmer 0 -1 1/move farmer 3 0 0/faceDirection Emily 2/speak Haley "Hey, I bet you'll understand my point of view here."/emote farmer 8/speak Emily "*sigh*... I'm really sorry to involve you in this, @. Haley is complaining because we normally alternate who gets the living room each week.$u"/faceDirection Haley 1/speak Haley "$q 45 null#You don't even need that much room to do yoga!$a#$r 46 -50 Event_clean2#Just lift weights in your own room!#$r 45 30 Event_clean1#Don't worry my goddess, you can always use it next week.#$r 46 -30 Event_clean3#Emily, I know haley is a brat, but..."/fork haleyWontDoIt/stopMusic/faceDirection Haley 3/emote Haley 12/pause 400/faceDirection Haley 1/speak Haley "Alright, you win. It still smells like incense in here anyway...$3"/faceDirection Haley 2/speak Emily "Thanks, @. She's actually really sweet.#$b#When she's not moody from her drugs...$s"/pause 1000/end
Entries.haleyWontDoIt: move Haley -2 0 0/move Haley 0 -2 0/emote Haley 12/faceDirection Emily 1/emote Emily 28/speak Emily "*sigh*... I guess I'll just move everything back to my room.$s"/pause 1000/end
Entries.12/f Haley 1000/p Haley: ragtime/5 6/farmer 5 11 0 Haley 5 6 0/move farmer 0 -3 0/pause 300/emote Haley 15/shake Haley 500/speak Haley "THEY SENT ME THE WRONG STEROIDS AGAIN!!$5#$b#HOW HARD IS IT TO PUT A COUPLE OF BOTTLES IN A BOX?!!$5#$b#My cycle is going to be ruined now...$2#$b#%Haly looks extremely upset. Her entire body is coverd with pulsing veins, and her skin is bright red."/pause 300/showFrame Haley 12/pause 150/showFrame Haley 0/pause 300/emote Haley 15/pause 300/speak Haley "WHAT ARE YOU EVEN DOING HERE, @?!! I DON'T REMEMBER INVITING YOU OVER!!$5#$b#%Your fight or flight response is leaning heavily toward flight at this moment.#$b#%However you fight the urge to flee, and stand your ground.#$b#%You meekly explain that you heard shouting, and that you came to make sure Haley was alright.#$b#...$3#$b#*sob*$2#$b#No, I'm not alright...$2"/showFrame Haley 22/pause 300/speak Haley "It's these stupid steroids.$2#$b#I need them to get bigger, so I sometimes take more than the reccomended dose...$2#$b#When I do, they make me super emotional. Sometimes I get so upset I can't even work out...$2#$b#But the results are worth it...$2"/showFrame Haley 0/speak Haley "Sorry. I'm over it.$3#$b#I'm fine. You can go now.$3#$b#Oh, and @? Thanks for listening to me.$4"/pause 300/friendship Haley 250/end dialogue Haley "*sob*$2"

Entries.choseToExplain: pause 100/textAboveHead Haley "I doubt it..."/pause 500/resetVariable/question fork2 "#I thought we were just friends! I didn't know it was so serious!#Pierre pressured me!
